page.title: 18Letchmore Heath continued.
page.content: During our visits we interviewed some local people and were told that Letchmore Heath has fallen victim to some of the recent spending cuts. For example there is no longer a Doctor, a church, or a post office in Letchmore Heath. Villagers must travel to Watford or Radlett. As there are only two buses per week it is difficult to live there without a car. Because of this, and the fact that there are so few local facilities, very few of us said we would like to live there. We felt that most of the people living in Letchmore Heath were white and middle class with mostly christian ideals. There is however one major exception which is Hare Krishna house were the men study and pray .This is the main South West base of the Hare Krishna Hindu sect.
